user_input:
Modify the DHEM model.
  o Get the datafile attribute for the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastrucutre level (use crud pipeline)
  o Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastrucutre level by setting all values that aren't 0 to 999. Copy the H2\Gas.
  o Create a new datafile object in the Datafile class using the Gas Pipeline category call it something relating to PCIPMI capacities Unlimited. Add the filename property with the name of the datafile just created.
  o Add a scenario called unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities
  o Add a max flow property to each object in the H2 inteconnection and H2 Internal bottleneck categories in the gas pipeline class, with the datafile and scenario created in the previous step. Use the crud pipeline
  o Clone the model "DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995" and add the new scenario. Call the model “DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline”
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications.

tasks.description: Retrieve the datafile attribute for the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level using the CRUD pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Modify the DHEM model ...', select the most appropriate attribute from the available options.

tasks.description: Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level by copying the H2\Gas file and setting all non-zero values to 999.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Modify the DHEM model ...', select the most appropriate file resource for modification.

tasks.description: Create a new datafile object in the Datafile class under the Gas Pipeline category, naming it with a reference to PCIPMI capacities Unlimited.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Modify the DHEM model ...', select the appropriate class and category for object creation.

tasks.description: Update the newly created datafile object by adding the filename property containing the name of the modified datafile.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Modify the DHEM model ...', select the proper property to update with the new filename.
Based on the user's request: 'Modify the DHEM model ...', determine the appropriate scenario creation parameters.

tasks.description: Update each object in the H2 inteconnection category within the gas pipeline class by adding a max flow property that references the new datafile and scenario using the CRUD pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Modify the DHEM model ...', select the appropriate objects in the H2 inteconnection category to update their properties.

tasks.description: Update each object in the H2 Internal bottleneck category within the gas pipeline class by adding a max flow property that references the new datafile and scenario using the CRUD pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Modify the DHEM model ...', identify and update the appropriate objects in the H2 Internal bottleneck category.

tasks.description: Clone the model 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995' and add the new scenario, then rename the cloned model to 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Modify the DHEM model ...', select the correct model to clone and apply the new scenario.
